reviews.text: For my first stop in at Casa mezcal, I found myself looking over the menu and finding several ceviches in the appetizer section. Well, I'm always up for a...

20 min & no sign of our food!

Terrible experience. Chips & salsa came out right away and we ordered lunch. The waitress disappeared. 

16 min after...
This place is amazing! So fresh! Wonderfully prepared and seasoned! And the staff was lovely as well!
